document_data.mainbody:
Flora of the Dalelands was a botany book that detailed many plants native to the Dalelands in north Faer√ªn.
Among the plants described in the book was Kelemvors Kiss, a type of poisonous shrub found deep in the forests of Shadowdale. This description was hand-written into the margins of a page.
* Nettie, a druid of the Emerald Grove.
